# Mitschrift
## Confidenz Intervall

$$ 
\bar{x} = Z_{1-\frac{\alpha}{2}}\pm\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}
$$
where $\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{n}}$ represents standard error

## How to make hypothesis tests
1. define $H_{0}$ and alternative hypothesis $H_{1}$
    * where $H_{1}$ is something new or innovative
2. get sample (Stichprobe)
3. define $\alpha$-error (default 0.05)
4. select test type

### How to choose test type
